title: Social Determinants of Health in Medical Education: Chronological Framework-Based Online Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing the capacity to analyze social determinants through real-world case studies for practicing professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain social determinants of health by categorizing them into structural and intermediary factors
Learners can systematically describe how social determinants influence health inequalities through analysis of real-world cases
Learners can complete and submit a project artifact by constructing a patient experience-based case study using chronological organization techniques
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
